shortDescription: VhttpdMgr in Thomson Reuters Velocity Analytics Vhayu Analytic Server 6.94 build 2995 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a URL in the fileName parameter during an importFile action.
vulnerabilityName: thomsonreuters velocity_analytics_vhayu_analytic_server Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
